pronunciation.pinyin: bā xiān guò hǎi , gè xiǎn shén tōng
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: Ba1 xian1 guo4 hai3 , ge4 xian3 shen2 tong1

meanings.value: the Eight Immortals cross the sea, each showing his own special talent
fig. (of each individual in a group) to give full play to one's unique capabilities
